text: Jya lokanni apalya palanakartyacya adesace palana kele, tyancyakarita bhala'i ahe ani jya lokanni tyacya adesace anusarana kele nahi, tara dharativara je kahi ahe te sarva tyacyajavala asela ani tyasobata tevadheca anakhi jasta asela maga te sarva kahi apalya badali (bacavasathi) de'una takila. Heca te loka hota, jyancyasathi motha va'ita hisoba ahe ani tyance thikana jahannama ahe, je phara va'ita thikana ahe
